description.value: You quickly use your momentum to topple and spring off of foes. You can use @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Wall Jump]{Wall Jump} to make additional jumps off of creatures larger than you as if they were walls. Once per turn when you make an additional jump off of a creature in this way, you can also attempt to @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Shove]{Shove} or @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Trip]{Trip} that creature as a free action.
